page.description: Dials the phone number in the control.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.DIAL_PHONE() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.DIAL_PHONE( [ Phone_Number as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Phone_NumberOptional. Default = the value in the control that currently has focus. The phone number to dial.
Description The &ltOBJECT>.DIAL_PHONE() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.DIAL_PHONE() method dials the phone number explicitly provided or in the field that currently has focus. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example This script dials the number in the Home_phone control. home_phone.activate() parentform.dial_phone()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
